Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: latte \lat"te\ (l[.a]*t[=a]"), n. Same as {cafe latte}; a type of espresso coffee served with foamy steamed milk, and usually served in a tall glass or mug. [PJC]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: caf'e latte \ca`f['e]" lat"te\ (k[.a]`f[=a]"l[.a]*t[=a]"), n. A type of espresso coffee topped with foamy steamed milk, and usually served in a tall glass or mug; also called {latte}. [PJC]
latte n : strong espresso coffee with a topping of frothed steamed milk [syn: {caffe latte}]
